body_html: It may have been fixed but the header files was ending up in something like /usr/local or lib or something/header/nccl.h. I think on a call with NVIDIA they mentioned working to fix that as it was not helpful. I am excited about this PR it may take some days to run through the scenarios and update the back-end build system. I also like the move that the build system assumes the files are stored where installed by apt-get when possible.
